name: Special City Sniper 2017
description: Play one of the best and unique Special City Sniper 2017 action game where you will find enemies and kill with the new sniper rifles aiming at the provided targets. Commando have responsibilities to save the resident's life as well war with enemies. Destroy enemy camps with sniper weapons and complete enemy killing. This is a gun shooting based game for fans of hot shooting with stylized graphics and realistic thrilling 3D environments. This Special City Sniper 2017 game is here for your great enjoyment and entertainment time with Lots of astounding and action scenes. You can also feel the real amazing weapon shooting effective sound on this commando fight mission simulated.
